page.title: 02Nicola Morris' day
page.content: My name is Nicola Morris and I am eleven years old.Yesterday,I turned off my{digital alarm clock,}jumped out of bed,dressed,ran downstairs into the kitchen and had{ breakfast;cereal}and orange juice.At 08.40 I walked to school.I went into my classroom,and during the morning I did some{maths,} {language work}and saw a television programme about the Domesday Project. At noon, we had our hour long lunch break.I ate all my{chicken{pasty}which I brought from{home.}In the afternoon we learnt some ordnance survey symbols and used them in the maps we drew of an imaginary Island. Then we had{games {_rounders}and we went home at 15.30 . After tea, I practised my{organ}for an hour. Soon it was dusk and I went out on my{skates}for a while.
